text: The flag of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines was created in October 1985. == Appearance == It has a vertical tricolour of blue, gold (double width) and green with three green diamonds arranged in the "V" pattern centred on the gold band, which represent the Grenadine Islands which fall under the government of Saint Vincent. These diamonds recall Saint Vincent as the "gems of the Antilles". Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Category:National symbols of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
title: Flag of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
